Sequence Information.Peptide Name: PG-1 analog 11 (Synthetic AMPs, Arg-rich, XXA, 1S=S, UCSS1a)
Sequence Information.Source: amino acid SUBSTITUTION, pig cathelicidin analog, animal-derived, natural derivatives

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is unique and shows only very low similarity (88.89%) toPG-1R: 33%, G: 17%, V=C=T: 11%.Activity: active against E. coli JM109 (MIC 6.3 ug/ml), B. subtilis BR151 (MIC 3.1 ug/ml), penicillin-resistant S. aureus 1206 (MIC 12.5 ug/ml), and vancomycin-resistant E. faecium A634 (MIC 6.3 ug/ml).
Literature Information.Author: Lai JR, Huck BR, Weisblum B, Gellman SH. 2002
Literature Information.Title: Design of non-cysteine-containing antimicrobial beta-hairpins: structure-activity relationship studies with linear protegrin-1 analogues.
